title: Landmark Washington D.C. Retreat near White House with Three Restaurants, Pool & Spa
description:
Experience the grandeur of this historic Washington D.C address, conveniently situated adjacent to the Rock Creek National Park in a premier residential neighbourhood. Having hosted renowned politicians, presidents and even world-famous entertainers, including The Beatles, this landmark hotel exudes a charismatic aura and boasts tastefully-designed rooms for ultimate relaxation.

Spend your days swimming in the glimmering outdoor pool, embark on a culinary adventure at the opulent Robert's Restaurant, sip on expertly-crafted cocktails at Marquee Bar & Lounge and indulge in an array of snacks and beverages at the onsite cafe, Morsel's. Also, take advantage of the hotel's location and explore the famous Smithsonian Zoo, the National Mall and the White House.
offer_address: 2500 Calvert Street NW, Washington, D.C. 20008, United States

title: Top-Rated Washington D.C. Escape near The White House
description: Presidential elegance awaits with a stay at the historic Hamilton Hotel D.C., overlooking the dazzling green of Washington D.C.â€™s Franklin Park, just a 10-minute wander from The White House. With heritage status, countless awards and a peerless downtown location, the hotel offers Washington D.C. sophistication at its finest. Enjoy authentic Italian plates at Via Sophia or head to the luxe microbar Society for bespoke cocktails with classic flair.
offer_address: 1001 14th St NW, Washington, DC 20005, United States

title: Elegant Washington D.C. Waterfront Escape Minutes from Political Epicenter Landmarks & Monuments
description: Experience the epitome of luxury at InterContinental Washington D.C. - The Wharf, an IHG Hotel, nestled on the banks of the Potomac River in the heart of America's capital city. This prestigious location places you within minutes of iconic landmarks, such as The White House and Lincoln Memorial. Ascend to the WAVES Rooftop Deck for panoramic river views, a refreshing pool and a vibrant bar scene. Savour casual dining at The Watering Hole, where you can watch boats bobbing in the marina as you dine.
location_description: InterContinental Washington D.C. - The Wharf, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 801 Wharf St SW, Washington, District of Columbia 20024, United States

title: Sophisticated Washington City Break with Onsite Dining & Indoor Pool
description:
Experience the epitome of sophistication and luxury in the heart of Washington D.C. at this elegant retreat nestled in the historic Georgetown district. This architectural gem is just moments from the vibrant Dupont Circle, where an array of lively restaurants and bars await exploration.

After a day of city adventure, unwind at The Courtyard Bar with the perfect sundowner and some light bites. Delight in delicious dishes at Juniper Restaurant, offering modern American cuisine, or relax in the stylish Lobby Lounge. For an evening of culture and entertainment, venture to the nearby Kennedy Centre, or take a leisurely stroll along the picturesque Potomac River.
offer_address: 2401 M Street NW, Washington D.C. 20037, United States

title: Washington DC Downtown Glamour near The Whitehouse
description:
Stay in heart of Washington, DC at The Dupont Circle Hotel, a Doyle Collection Hotel bringing glamour to the capital. Designer renovations by Martin Brudnizki are enhanced by incredible facilities. There are three eateries to dine in, including the swanky Pembroke restaurant serving up contemporary American cuisine and Doyle & Co for fresh pastries and Lavazza coffee. Plus, a state-of-the-art 24-hour fitness centre offers everything you need for a great workout.

Stay a stone's throw from Washington, DC's iconic sights. The White House, the Smithsonian and the Lincoln Memorial are all under a 10-minute drive away, while the restaurant and shops surrounding the Dupont Circle are right outside the hotel's doors.
offer_address: 500 New Hampshire Ave NW, Washington, DC 20036, United States
